tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE spectral_signatures (
    signature_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    land_cover_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    wavelength_range VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    spectral_values TEXT NOT NULL,
    collection_date DATE NOT NULL,
    last_updated TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE spectral_signatures (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    land_cover_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    spectral_band_1 FLOAT NOT NULL,
    spectral_band_2 FLOAT NOT NULL,
    spectral_band_3 FLOAT NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE remote_sensing_analysis (
    analysis_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    image_url TEXT NOT NULL,
    analysis_date DATE NOT NULL,
    land_cover_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    classification_result VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE land_cover_attributes (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    land_cover_type_id INT,
    attribute_name VARCHAR(50),
    attribute_value TEXT,
    FOREIGN KEY (land_cover_type_id) REFERENCES spectral_signatures_land_cover_types(id)
);

CREATE TABLE spectral_signatures (
 signature_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 land_cover_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
 spectral_band_1 FLOAT NOT NULL,
 spectral_band_2 FLOAT NOT NULL,
 spectral_band_3 FLOAT NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE land_cover_types (
 cover_type_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 cover_type_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE spectral_analysis_results (
 result_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 signature_id INT FOREIGN KEY REFERENCES spectral_signatures(signature_id),
 analysis_date DATE,
 analysis_result TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE analysis_comments (
 comment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 result_id INT FOREIGN KEY REFERENCES spectral_analysis_results(result_id),
 comment_text TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE user_accounts (
 user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 username VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
 email VARCHAR(100) UNIQUE NOT NULL,
 password VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL
)
